items.entry: Your troll becomes immune to lightning damage, and its attacks can deal lightning damage if it wants, it gains an additional 10 feet movement speed and attacks of opportunity against it have disadvantage.

subclassFeature.name: Edicts of the Troll
entries: Beginning at 11th level, you close with your troll. The following commands are added to your Edict options:

items.name: Reconstruct.
items.entry: You command your troll to get ready to regenerate. Until the start of your next turn when your troll takes damage, it can use its reaction to then heal for {@dice 3d8}.

items.name: Giant Form.
items.entry: Your troll comes under the effect of the {@spell Enlarge/Reduce} spell, with the enlarge part chosen, for 1 minute.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Regeneration
entries: At 15th level you have mastered the act of regenerating from being bonded with your troll.
You can cast the {@spell regenerate} Spell once per long rest, it is a Soul Binder Spell for you. When you cast it using this feature it has a casting time of 1 action.

spell.name: Focus Bolt
entries: You create a bolt of pure soul energy and fire it towards a creature within range.

Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to mark it with your energy. On hit the target takes {@damage 1d4} force damage, and if your companion is within 30 feet of the creature, your companion can use its reaction to move up to 15 feet towards that creature without provoking opportunity attacks.
The spell's damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d4}), 11th level ({@damage 3d4}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d4})

spell.name: Imbued Strike
entries: You imbue a creature with soul magic to make their strike hit extra hard. You target a creature within range that you can see, the first time that creature hits another creature with a weapon attack before the start of your next turn, that attack will deal an extra {@damage 1d4} force damage, or {@damage 1d6} extra if you targeted your companion.
The spell's damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d4} or {@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d4} or {@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d4} or {@damage 4d6})

spell.name: Soul Switch
entries: You and your companion switch positions as you step through the Ethereal plane. You appear in your companion's space and it appears in your previous location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range of this spell increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Soul Punch

time.condition: which you take when your companion hits a creature with an attack within range

entries: After your companion attacks a creature, you are ready to follow through with an infused punch that the target will feel in their very soul.
Make a melee spell attack against the creature your companion just hit. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Thrashing Tether
entries: You send a pulse of energy through the bond that links you and your companion, damaging any enemy that stands between you.

Any creature caught in a 5 feet wide line leading from you to your companion, must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 1d12} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

On subsequent turns, you can use an action to send another pulse though the tether, and repeat the effect from when the spell was cast. If you or your companion move more than 30 feet apart, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Transfer Vitality
entries: You transfer some of your own vitality to restore your companion life.
You spend one of your own hit dice, roll it and add your Constitution modifier to the roll, your companion then regain hit points equal to the total.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can use 1 more hit dice for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Energy Eruption
entries: You flush the area around your companion with soul energy damaging any creature who dare stands too close.

Any number of creatures of your choice within 10 feet of your companion must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d8} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Soul Shackles
entries: Ribbons of soul energy springs from your companion and wraps themselves around nearby enemies.

Any number of creatures of your choice within 15 feet of your companion must make a Strength saving throw, on a failed saving throw a creature is {@condition restrained}. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to repeat the saving throw ending the effect on a success.

spell.name: Companion Recall
entries: You call your companion back to you though the Ethereal plane. Your soulbound appears in a space within 10 feet of you. If your companion is on a different plane than you, there is a 50% chance the spell will fail.

spell.name: Soul Leech
entries: You try to drain energy from a creature and transfer it to your companion.
Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within range, on hit you deal {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage to that creature, your companion then regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

components.m: a shard of obsidian worth at least 200gp

entries: You cover your companion with a thin layer of impenetrable, magically infused obsidian. Until the end of your next turn, your companion is immune to all damage.
